page.title: 08ROADS AND TRANSPORT
page.content:
{ ROADS All of the roads within the study area are of B-class or less except for three. These three link Kilkeel with the rest of Northern Ireland via Newry, Newcastle and Hilltown. Although these are busy A-class roads they are in need of repair, especially the one to Newcastle.
{ BUS SERVICES The{Kilkeel to Newcastle}bus cuts through the south-east corner of the study area. These buses usually leave in thirty-five minute intervals. Quite a few stop at the Moor Road to set-down and collect workers at the Aircraft Furnishings and Moor Steel factories. The{Kilkeel to Newry}bus runs only through a rural corner of our area. As the population is sparce here there
